snippet: Administration officials cautioned that President Obama had not made a final decision or offered Chuck Hagel the job as defense secretary, but those who know the former senator said all signs point to his selection.
abstract: Administration officials caution that Pres Obama has not made a final decision or offered Chuck Hagel the job as defense secretary, but those who know Hagel say all signs point to his selection.
lead_paragraph: Administration officials cautioned that President Obama had not made a final decision or offered Chuck Hagel the job as defense secretary, but those who know the former senator said all signs point to his selection.

headline.seo: Obama Could Name Chuck Hagel to Defense Post Next Week
headline.main: Nomination of Hagel Could Come Next Week
